sentences.cn: 身材高挑、举止优雅的年轻女子
一套具有乔治王朝时期风格的典雅排房

sentences.en: He looked relaxed and elegant and had the patina of success.
sentences.cn: 他神态轻松潇洒，给人成功的印象。

sentences.en: He was a baroque figure dressed in theatrical, but elegant, clothes.
sentences.cn: 他是个巴罗克式的人物，衣着华丽但又不失优雅。

sentences.en: His mother was an elegant, cultivated woman.
sentences.cn: 他的母亲是一位端庄文雅的女性。

sentences.en: Its once-elegant white pillars are peeling.
sentences.cn: 曾经典雅的白色立柱正在掉漆。

sentences.en: Older women look best in classically elegant styles.
sentences.cn: 年纪大一点的女性穿古朴典雅的服装最好看。

sentences.en: Rodney was a cheerful, elegant and gregarious if rather contentious man.
sentences.cn: 罗德尼尽管非常喜欢与人争辩，却是个阳光、优雅、合群的人。

sentences.en: She brought in a tray heavy with elegant sandwiches, scones and cakes.
sentences.cn: 她端进来一只盘子，里面盛满了精美的三明治、烤饼和蛋糕。

sentences.en: She has become a grotesque parody of her former elegant self.
sentences.cn: 她成为了以前那个举止优雅的自己的怪诞模仿品.

sentences.en: She is always so chic, so elegant.
sentences.cn: 她总是那么时髦，那么优雅。

sentences.en: She produces elegant wedding gowns in a variety of sumptuous fabrics.
sentences.cn: 她用各种华贵的布料制作高雅的婚纱。

sentences.en: She was an elegant and accomplished woman.

sentences.cn: 餐馆内部别致的新装潢

sentences.en: Two elegant Scotsmen travelling together wore dashing kilts at dinner.
sentences.cn: 两名结伴旅行的优雅苏格兰男子就餐时穿了潇洒的苏格兰方格呢短裙。

sentences.en: You can dine in elegant surroundings.
sentences.cn: 你可以在雅致的环境中进餐。
